amendment.description: An amendment to the provisions of H.Res. 522, the amendment in the nature of a substitute now printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in Part A of House Report 111-143, is considered as adopted as orginial text for the purpose of further amendment.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
